eya wagakiwayuththanta nawathath hithannata bara karamu.upali samarasinhachaya - sudam gunasinha2013 paha wasara shishyathwa wibhagayedi lakunu 198 k laba ganimin diwayine prathama sthanaya dinagath, galla mahinda widyalaye sandaru thathsara balahewa sisuwata, amerikawe disnilanthaye dina 14 ka adhyayana charikawak pirinamana bawa dakunu palath adhyapana amathya chandima rasaputhra mahatha prakasha karayi.pasugiyada galla mahinda widyalayata gos sandaru thathsara puthanuwanta thama suba pathum pirinamu amathyawaraya, widuhalpathi wasantha siriwardhana mahathatath panthi bhara aacharini dimuthu lakmali da silwa mahathmiya pramukha aacharya mandalayatath thama kruthagnyathawa pala kaleya.pita pita dewana wathawatath mema gaurawaya dakunu palathata dina ganimata hakiwima pilibanda palathe adhyapana amathyawaraya washayen thama nihathamani aadambarayak bhukthi windina bawath shishyathwa wibhagaya ilakka karaganimin palatha thula kriyathmaka kala ‘jayasankha’ wadasatahana me sandahathiranathmakawa dayaka wu bawa thama wishwasaya bawath rasaputhra mahatha sandahan kaleya.
